description: Fantastic quiet friendly McLennan community. This Luxury duplex style 2 level townhouse is in one of the best locations of Kinsbridge. This home features 4 large bedrooms 2.5 bathrooms including big master bedroom with 4 pc ensuite and walk in closet, side by side 2 car garage, bright open Stylish living equipped with high efficiency condensing boiler & Low-E windows, radiant in-floor heating, granite counters, maple shaker kitchen cabinets, beautiful fenced yard and patio area, low density living at its finest. Close to schools, transit, shopping, parks & recreations.
